title: NT CUTTER 9mm Snap-Off Precision Blades, 30 Degree Blades, 100-Blade/Pack, 1 Pack, Black (BD-2000)
description: On white 30-degree black refill snap-off blades for standard duty utility knives. 100 black blades are packed in a protective plastic container. High quality specialty blades are great to use for vinyl sign cutting, leather trimming, precision trimming, car wrapping, sign making, BD-2000 making, and for cleaning up rough edges. These professional blades are made of high quality carbon tool steel and produced through multiple stages of precise process to obtain the ultimate sharpness and optimum edge-retention. The process includes “bluing process” and it gives oxide coating on the blade with Blue-Black appearance and protects from rusting. 100 refill carbon steel blades per pack. Made in Japan.
